name: talviliiga
description: Talviliiga Tournament Viewer - Simple, fast tournament schedule app

scripts.dev: npm run build:css & node --import "data:text/javascript,import { register } from 'node:module'; import { pathToFileURL } from 'node:url'; register('ts-node/esm', pathToFileURL('./'));" src/app.ts
scripts.parse: node --import "data:text/javascript,import { register } from 'node:module'; import { pathToFileURL } from 'node:url'; register('ts-node/esm', pathToFileURL('./'));" scripts/parseExcel.ts
